content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find the apartment to your liking, given its prime location and modern amenities. How much are you considering to offer for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I'm a student, so I'm on a tight budget. I was hoping for something around 350 euros a month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for the location and standard of the apartment. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I understand that. But I'm still a student and I'm trying to save money. How about 400 euros a month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While 400 euros is more in line with what I'm expecting, I believe we can do better. The apartment is in high demand, and I've had other inquiries. Would you be willing to go up to 450 euros? This would reflect the market value and the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, I can go up to 475 euros. It's a good compromise between your price and my budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm looking for a tenant who values the quality and location of the apartment. 475 euros is still below my asking price. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at 500 euros? This would be a fair reflection of the apartment's worth.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good point. I can agree to the price of 500 euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 500 euros! Congratulations, Yi-Nuo, you've secured a great apartment in the city center. Let's proceed with the rental agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
